accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Sidney A. Wolff Additional Arbitration Files #5637. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Celanese Fibers Company and the Textile Workers Union of America Local 2024, 1093, 1874, 1384; UMW District 50 Local 15153; Amalgamated Clothing Workers Union Local 2024 (8 issues)

scopecontent.p: Issues: Work assignments (1974); suspension (1976); wage rates upon transfer (1975); welders protest assignment of work (1974); work load; subcontracting (1975-1976); absency policy (1974); transfers and filling job vacancies (1974) Materials include: transcripts, general correspondences, supporting documentation, opinions and awards, company briefs, union briefs, pamphlet "Your Guide" (contains information on policy, practices and procedures of the plant), telegrams, Decisions and Recommendations (Labor Relations Reporter), manuscript notes, Agreement (1973), Demands for Arbitration

did.unittitle: (Pennsylvania) Federation of Telephone Workers of Pennsylvania and the Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania - 6 issues

scopecontent.p: Has the company under the PIC Agreement improperly assigned to crafts other than splicers the capping of pic cables where an insulating compound is used in the cap? Job classification, work assignment Does the pic agreement limit the type of terminals or other types of equipment on which crafts other than splicers may perform pic splicing work? Is the replacement of a pic, lead or other cable, with a piece of pic cable "new construction work" under paragraph one of the pic agreement or a "subsequent change" under paragraph 2? Reasonable time period to measure pic work determination of the major pic disagreement includes: general correspondence, manuscript notes, opinion and award

did.unittitle: Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania and the federation of Telephone Workers - 6 issues (continued)

scopecontent.p: Has the company under the PIC Agreement improperly assigned to crafts other than splicers the capping of pic cables where an insulating compound is used in the cap? Job classification, work assignment Does the pic agreement limit the type of terminals or other types of equipment on which crafts other than splicers may perform pic splicing work? Is the replacement of a pic, lead or other cable, with a piece of pic cable "new construction work" under paragraph one of the pic agreement or a "subsequent change" under paragraph 2? Reasonable time period to measure pic work determination of the major pic disagreement includes: supporting documentation, union brief, company brief (2 volumes), union post-hearing memorandum, general correspondence, arbitration bill, company brief re: fourth PIC arbitration, union brief re: 4th PIC arbitration, opening statement of the company in the 4th PIC case, manuscript notes; transcripts: 4th pic arbitration, exhibits; 4th pic arbitration case (1969), the PIC agreement administration procedures
